agents.ground_airport.GroundAirport¶

class agents.ground_airport.GroundAirport(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: Agent

Agent representing an Airport and capturing the behaviour of processes on the airport for flights and passengers.

This includes: - Ground side:

  • Provide turnaround times for flights

  • Provide connecting times for passengers in airports

  • Air side:

    • Provide estimation of Taxi-out

    • Provide actual Taxi-out and Taxi-in times

Possible evolution:
  • Separation on two different entities with different responsibilities:

    • Flight processes

    • Passengers processes

give_connecting_time_dist(dists[, mct_q])

give_taxi_in_time_estimation_dist(dists)

Initialise the taxi-in estimation distribution in the agent dists is a two-layer dict with ac_type, ao_type keys.

Initialise the taxi-out estimation distribution in the agent dists is a two-layer dict with ac_type, ao_type keys.

Initialise the taxi time 'noise' distribution for the agent dists is a two-layer dict with ac_type, ao_type keys.

give_turnaround_time_dists(dists)

Initialise the turnaround time distributions in the agent dists is a two-layer dict with ac_type, ao_type keys.

Register the UID of the DMAN operating at the airport

register_eaman([eaman])

Register the UID of the (E-)AMAN operating at the airport

register_flight(flight)

Register the flights operating at the airport with information of their type (international,national) (needed to assess the type of connectivity for passengers)

Attributes

dic_role

apply_agent_modifications()¶

Modifications of Roles in agent based on loaded modules

give_connecting_time_dist(dists, mct_q=0.95)¶

Initialise connecting time distribution for the agent dists is a single layer dict with pax_type keys. Connecting times vary as a function of type of connection (National-National), (International-International), Other

give_taxi_in_time_estimation_dist(dists)¶

Initialise the taxi-in estimation distribution in the agent dists is a two-layer dict with ac_type, ao_type keys.

give_taxi_out_time_estimation_dist(dists)¶

Initialise the taxi-out estimation distribution in the agent dists is a two-layer dict with ac_type, ao_type keys.

give_taxi_time_add_dist(dists)¶

Initialise the taxi time ‘noise’ distribution for the agent dists is a two-layer dict with ac_type, ao_type keys.

give_turnaround_time_dists(dists)¶

Initialise the turnaround time distributions in the agent dists is a two-layer dict with ac_type, ao_type keys.

register_dman(dman=None)¶

Register the UID of the DMAN operating at the airport

register_eaman(eaman=None)¶

Register the UID of the (E-)AMAN operating at the airport

register_flight(flight)¶

Register the flights operating at the airport with information of their type (international,national) (needed to assess the type of connectivity for passengers)

Set log file for the Agent. TBC by logging system
